Uses of Package
building_blocks

  • Packages that use building_blocks 
    Package Description
    main  
    topologies  
  • Classes in building_blocks used by main 
    Class and Description
    Crossing
    Provides the crossing building block that is required to enable the intersection between four waveguides.
    MicroringResonator
    Provides the microring resonator building block that provides the necessary switching functions.
    Waveguide
    Provides the waveguide building block.
  • Classes in building_blocks used by topologies 
    Class and Description
    Crossing
    Provides the crossing building block that is required to enable the intersection between four waveguides.
    Waveguide
    Provides the waveguide building block.
